scenes.description: 'NEXT' transition screen showing highlights and upcoming performers for the 'hololive side'.

subtitles.original: 三番線ホームから
subtitles.english: From platform number three

subtitles.original: ずれ落ちる足元
subtitles.english: My feet slip

subtitles.original: ハングリーこじらせて
subtitles.english: Worsening my hunger

subtitles.original: 吐きそうな人生
subtitles.english: A life that makes me want to vomit

subtitles.original: 止まない雨はないよりさきに
subtitles.english: Before saying "no rain lasts forever"

subtitles.original: その傘をくれよ
subtitles.english: Give me that umbrella

subtitles.original: あれが欲しい これが欲しい
subtitles.english: I want that, I want this

subtitles.original: 全て欲しいと言ったら嬉しい？
subtitles.english: Would you be happy if I said I want it all?

subtitles.original: 幸せになりたい
subtitles.english: I want to be happy

subtitles.original: 楽して生きていたい
subtitles.english: I want to live an easy life

subtitles.original: 全部めちゃくちゃにしたい
subtitles.english: I want to mess everything up

subtitles.original: 何もかも消し去りたい
subtitles.english: I want to wipe everything away

subtitles.original: あなたのその胸の中
subtitles.english: Deep inside your heart

subtitles.original: Rest In Peace まで行こうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's go until Rest In Peace

subtitles.original: もう一個だけ迎える天国じゃ
subtitles.english: In the heaven we'll one day reach

subtitles.original: どうも居心地悪い
subtitles.english: I won't feel at home there at all

subtitles.original: 奪い返して 奪い取って
subtitles.english: Reclaim it, seize it

subtitles.original: 笑ってくれマイハニー
subtitles.english: Smile for me, my honey

subtitles.original: 努力 未来 A BEAUTIFUL STAR
subtitles.english: Effort, future, A BEAUTIFUL STAR

subtitles.original: 努力 未来 A BEAUTIFUL STAR
subtitles.english: Effort, future, A BEAUTIFUL STAR

subtitles.original: 努力 未来 A BEAUTIFUL STAR
subtitles.english: Effort, future, A BEAUTIFUL STAR

subtitles.original: なんかすごい良い感じ
subtitles.english: Feeling pretty great

subtitles.original: HAPPY LUCKY こんにちはBABY
subtitles.english: HAPPY LUCKY Hello, BABY

subtitles.original: もう一個だけいたい そりゃつまらない
subtitles.english: I want to be here just a bit longer, it's boring otherwise

subtitles.original: HAPPY LUCKY こんにちはBABY
subtitles.english: HAPPY LUCKY Hello, BABY

subtitles.english: Effort, future, A BEAUTIFUL STAR

subtitles.english: Feeling pretty great

subtitles.english: Effort, future, A BEAUTIFUL STAR

subtitles.english: Effort, future, A BEAUTIFUL STAR

subtitles.english: Effort, future, A BEAUTIFUL STAR

subtitles.original: 努力 未来 A BEAUTIFUL STAR
subtitles.english: Effort, future, A BEAUTIFUL STAR

subtitles.original: NEXT
subtitles.english: NEXT

subtitles.original: 本当は分かってた
subtitles.english: To be honest, I knew

subtitles.original: いけないことだったって分かってたのに
subtitles.english: I knew it was something I shouldn't do, yet...

subtitles.original: この手をすり抜ける全部が愛に見えたの
subtitles.english: Everything slipping through my fingers looked like love

subtitles.original: 確かめていた言葉が形になって揺れるだけ
subtitles.english: The words I was confirming just take shape and sway

subtitles.original: 弾いて描いて きっとそれだけ
subtitles.english: Typing it out, that must be all

subtitles.original: つまらないな 世界の読み合わせ
subtitles.english: How boring, the world's proofreading

subtitles.original: あとちょっとね 分かりかけてたのに
subtitles.english: Just a little more, I was starting to understand, yet...

subtitles.original: 脳に這入って 全部忘れちゃえ
subtitles.english: Enter my brain, and forget everything

subtitles.original: 数センチの熱を読み合わせ
subtitles.english: Reading the heat of a few centimeters

subtitles.original: 見つめ合えたら
subtitles.english: If we can look into each other's eyes

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us

subtitles.original: やるせない日々 解像度の悪い夢を見たい
subtitles.english: Helpless days, I want to see low-resolution dreams

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us

subtitles.original: 甘いハッタリ Don't stop the music darling
subtitles.english: Sweet bluffing, don't stop the music darling

subtitles.original: 本当に分かってる？
subtitles.english: Do you really understand?

subtitles.original: いけないことだったって分かってる
subtitles.english: I know it was something I shouldn't do

subtitles.original: 多分
subtitles.english: Maybe

subtitles.original: 時間だけが過ぎてく温度に満ちていく
subtitles.english: Only time passes, filling up with temperature

subtitles.original: 言い訳してる 間もなく
subtitles.english: Making excuses, before long

subtitles.original: 裸になってしまうだけ
subtitles.english: I'll just end up naked

subtitles.original: きっと溜まっていくんだ ずっと
subtitles.english: It'll surely keep accumulating, forever

subtitles.original: 終わってしまえばいいと ふっと
subtitles.english: Thinking it'd be fine if it just ended, suddenly

subtitles.original: 傷んで腐っていく あの甘い果実のように
subtitles.english: Bruising and rotting, like that sweet fruit

subtitles.original: 僕ら壊れていく
subtitles.english: We are breaking down

subtitles.original: だから
subtitles.english: So

subtitles.original: 酔って舞って 全部忘れちゃえ
subtitles.english: Get drunk and dance, forget everything

subtitles.original: そうかもね 隣り合わせ
subtitles.english: Maybe so, side-by-side

subtitles.original: 見つめ合えたら
subtitles.english: If we can look into each other's eyes

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us

subtitles.original: 分かりたいのに 変にまどろっこしい嘘が嫌い
subtitles.english: I want to understand, yet I hate awkwardly tedious lies

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us

subtitles.original: 分かりたいのに
subtitles.english: Even though I want to understand

subtitles.original: Two step from hell my darling
subtitles.english: Two step from hell, my darling

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us

subtitles.original: やるせない日々 解像度の悪い夢を見たい
subtitles.english: Helpless days, I want to see low-resolution dreams

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us

subtitles.original: 甘いハッタリ Don't stop the music darling
subtitles.english: Sweet bluffing, don't stop the music darling

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us

subtitles.original: 分からないけど
subtitles.english: I don't know, but...
